Translations.Text: My stvoryuvaly lyudsʹkyy, ta my znayemo shcho vin shepoche do sebe. My ye blyzhchi yomu nizh yoho jugular vena
Dva zapysu (anhely), u pravi ta u vlivo, stalo zapys
Ne vysliv vin vymovlyayutʹ bez pylʹnoho svidka
Nareshti, nemynuchyy coma smerti prybuvaye; tse ye shcho vy postaralysya unyknuty
rih duyetʹsya; tse yavlyaye soboyu poobitsyane denʹ
Kozhna dusha prybuvaye z herder ta svidkom
Vy zvychayno buly oblivious do tse. My zaraz usuyemo vashu vualʹ; sʹohodni, vash zir (takyy sylʹnyy yak) stalʹ
Kydayutʹ u Gehenna kozhnyy upertyy disbeliever
Vin zdiymavsya bilya BOHA inshyy boh. Kynʹte yoho u suvoryy retribution
Yoho kompanyon skazav, "Nash Lord, ya ne pryzviv do pomylky yo; vin daleko astray
Vin skazav, "Ne tryvala vorozhnecha pered Meni; YA dostatno poperedyv vas
Nichoho ne mozhe buty zminene zaraz. YA nikoly ne unjust do lyudey
